INSTALL_MSG:
Message from The Wolf: Congratulations on making it this far :smiley: ! If you have any issues with my cogs, feel free to jump into Red's Discord Server under #coding and ask for @Wolfstorm :smiley: (link can be found below).

NAME: Quote System
SHORT: Quotes for Discord, based on the Quote System mIRC Script (Without find/search Functionality)
DESCRIPTION:
Quote System for Red-DiscordBot (Open for General Use!). Based off of the MIRC Quote Script by Zsadist (Hawkee Link: http://hawkee.com/snippet/8378/ ). 

Please submit issues if you find any bugs or have suggestions.
